definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM

sentences.english: The pathogenic biological characteristics of Sessileflower acanthopanax root rot was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对短梗五加根腐病病原菌进行了生物学特性研究。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The bacterial endotoxins test can be used for the quali…
sentences.chinese: 结论刺五加注射液可用细菌内毒素检查法控制热原。

sentences.english: Studies on the pollen morphology of eight species of Acanthopanax.
sentences.chinese: 8种五加属植物花粉形态的研究。

sentences.english: This paper investigated the extraction and isolation technology of polysaccharides from Acanthopanax obovatus Hoo.
sentences.chinese: 通过正交试验优化了倒卵叶五加多糖的提取分离工艺。

sentences.chinese: 贵州五加科某些种类的考订。

sentences.english: It has reliable effect to treat ITP with Acanthopanex Injection and Prednisone.

sentences.english: To establish the method for quality control of Ciwujia soft capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立刺五加软胶囊的质量控制方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the tissue characteristics of radix and rhizome of Acanthopanax senticosus(Rupr et Maxim) Harms in Heilongjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黑龙江省刺五加根及根茎的组织特征。

sentences.english: Security needs to be "white and black", management must be "two"".
sentences.chinese: 安全需要“白加黑”，管理必须“五加二”。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a qualitative and quantitative method for Fufang Nanwujia oral solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立复方南五加口服液定性定量方法。

sentences.english: It also features Korean ginseng and eleuthero for additional herbal energy support.
sentences.chinese: 同时也含有高丽参和刺五加带来额外草本能量补充。

sentences.english: Objective:To establish the qualitative and quantitative methods of Baotai Ling.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立复方南五加口服液定性定量方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the inhibitory effect of Acanthopanax giraldii Harms Var Hispidus Hoo polysaccharides(AGP)on the human gastric cancer cell.
sentences.chinese: 目的本文对红毛五加多糖对胃癌的抑制作用进行研究。

sentences.english: Results The total flavonoids contents of Acanthopanax senticosus extract and injection were similar.
sentences.chinese: 结果刺五加提取物与刺五加注射液的总黄酮含量相近。
